name: Brandpoint Feed Importer
author: Joel Leger

sections.description:
Articles are imported into a specified category and assigned to a specified author. Currently only one feed URL at a time is supported.

Plugin uses AJAX so you’ll need JavaScript enabled in order to use it.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘BrandpointFeedImporter.zip’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

Plugin’s page appears under the Settings menu as Brandpoint Feed Importer
sections.faq:
1. Do I need this plugin to use Brandpoint’s content? No, but it makes it a whole lot easier.
  2. Do I have to pay to have Brandpoint write content for me? Yes, please contact Brandpoint at www.brandpoint.com to get setup.

short_description: This plugin allows you to import articles and other content written by Brandpoint or any other source using the Brandpoint custom feed format.
description:
Articles are imported into a specified category and assigned to a specified author. Currently only one feed URL at a time is supported.

Plugin uses AJAX so you’ll need JavaScript enabled in order to use it.
